0: Our room along with most of the resort was pretty outdated and old but as many have said there are tons of maintenance staff constantly working on the resort
Both rooms confirmed that the property is dated and in need of repair
The reason I have given it 4 stars is because the rooms are very tired and could do with an update
I requested maintenance to repair A C they came three times but was never able to fix A C system
mattresses are part of the renovation plan this summer
Hotel fallen apart will be close in July for renovation
I hear they are closing down in July for remodel
I understand the hotel is currently undergoing renovations but I hope they leave the landscaping as it is
Already planning our next visit for 2018 and can not wait to see the renovations that are going to take place in the next few weeks
1: Well to our disappointment the resort was closed for a remodel when we had time off for our vacation
This was our second visit to this lovely hotel and most certainly not our last the refurbishment is of a high standard and very tastefully done
We have just paid for our April 2018 trip and we are looking forward to returning and seeing old staff and new in the renovated resort
This was our fourth or fifth trip to Excellence Punta Cana but our first since the renovations
Just spent another 10 nights at the refurbished Excellence Punta Cana
Rooms are pretty and very updated modern
Our room was bright clean recently updated and spacious
The renovations are great the rooms are brighter and more spacious the gym is the best in any resort we have seen the restaurants offer a nice variety and the staff is superb
Amazing facilities beautiful beach clean updated rooms and the service was top of the line
